page.title: 13Games children play
page.content:
{Playground:}The most popular game is overline. Someone on it and the names get shouted out for them to and run across the playground. If stampede is called, everybody runs. If anyone is called and doesn't get across the playground without being touched, they are on it. Elastics is another game with girls. This is played with a piece of elastic which has to be jumped over without touching. {On grass:}We play football, rounders, cricket, leapfrog, and in season, conkers. {At home:}We play computer games & Monopoly. Girls play with Sindy - a grown up doll with lots of clothes & equipment & boys have their action man dolls too. Lego building bricks are used a lot.
Frances Johnson
